home.title: Dasturchi
home.description: Men ilg‘or texnologiyalar yordamida real muammolarni hal qilishga qaratilgan yechimlar yarataman. Men uchun dasturlash – bu shunchaki kod yozish emas, balki insonlarga foydali bo‘lgan vositalarni yaratish san’atidir.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Texnologiyalar, dizayn va yaxshiroq yechimlar haqida fikrlar

portfolio.title: Loyihalar
portfolio.description: Men uchun dasturlash – bu shunchaki kod yozish emas, balki insonlarga foydali bo‘lgan vositalarni yaratish san’atidir.

about.title: Men haqimda
about.description: Men ilg‘or texnologiyalar va barqaror yechimlar asosida raqamli mahsulotlar ishlab chiqishga ishtiyoqmand dasturchiman. Men uchun har bir loyiha — bu yangi imkoniyat va yangi yondashuv. Maqsadim — kodni faqat ishlashi uchun emas, balki samarali ishlashi, oson kengaytirilishi va foydalanuvchiga qulay bo‘lishi uchun yozish.
about.journey_description1: Begun learning web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Built my first websites and discovered my passion for creating digital experiences.
about.journey_description2: Dove deep into modern web technologies, mastering React, Node.js, and various databases. Started working on more complex full-stack applications.
about.journey_description3: Started working on more complex full-stack applications.
about.work_together_description: Men har doim yangi imkoniyatlar va qiziqarli loyihalarni o'rganishga tayyorman. Yaxshi loyihalar yaratish uchun birgalikda ishlashim mumkin!

contact.title: Bog'lanish
contact.description: Loyiha haqida yoki oddiy chatga qo'shilishni istaysizmi? Men siz bilan bog'lanishni istaysiz. Biz qanday qilib sizning idellaringizni amalga oshirishimiz mumkinligini o'rganamiz.
contact.for_work_description: Men hozirda freelancer loyihalar va to'liq vaqtli imkoniyatlarga tayyor. Biz sizning keyingi loyihingizni o'rganamiz!
contact.subject: Mavzu

site_messages.error_msg: Xatolik yuz berdi. Iltimos, qayta urinib ko'ring.
